statements: SELECT * FROM sponsorships;
SELECT sponsorship_id, sponsor_company_name FROM sponsorships ORDER BY sponsor_company_name DESC;
SELECT sponsor_company_name, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE contract_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND contract_end_date > '2021-06-30';
SELECT sponsorship_id, sponsor_company_name, obligation_details FROM sponsorships ORDER BY sponsorship_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_amount > 5000 ORDER BY contract_start_date DESC;
SELECT sponsorship_id, sponsor_company_name FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_company_name LIKE 'A%' AND contract_end_date > CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE obligation_details IS NOT NULL AND YEAR(contract_start_date) = 2022 ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC;
SELECT sponsor_company_name, SUM(sponsorship_amount) AS total_amount FROM sponsorships GROUP BY sponsor_company_name HAVING total_amount > 10000;
SELECT sponsorship_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY sponsorship_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies;
SELECT company_name, email FROM sponsor_companies;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM sponsor_companies WHERE id = 2;
SELECT agreement_id, contract_start_date, agreed_amount FROM sponsorship_agreements;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies WHERE id = 1;
SELECT company_name, email FROM sponsor_companies WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT sponsor_id, contract_start_date, contract_end_date FROM sponsorship_agreements WHERE agreed_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT sponsor_id, obligations FROM sponsorship_agreements WHERE obligations IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sponsor_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM sponsor_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contract_terms WHERE contract_value > 5000;
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date FROM contract_terms WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT obligation_description FROM obligations WHERE due_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY obligation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM sponsor_companies WHERE company_name LIKE '%Corp%';
SELECT contract_id, start_date, end_date, contract_value FROM contract_terms WHERE contract_value > 5000;
SELECT * FROM obligations WHERE due_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT obligations.obligation_id, obligations.obligation_description, contract_terms.contract_value FROM obligations INNER JOIN contract_terms ON obligations.contract_id = contract_terms.contract_id WHERE contract_terms.start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies;
SELECT company_name, email FROM sponsor_companies WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT agreement_id, company_id, term_id FROM sponsorship_agreements ORDER BY company_id DESC;
SELECT obligation_id, status FROM obligations WHERE due_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT contract_value, start_date, end_date FROM contract_terms WHERE contract_value > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT company_name, email FROM sponsor_companies WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT company_id, company_name, contact_person FROM sponsor_companies WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM contract_terms WHERE contract_value > 10000;

SELECT agreement_id, company_name, term_description, due_date FROM sponsorship_agreements JOIN sponsor_companies ON sponsorship_agreements.company_id = sponsor_companies.company_id JOIN contract_terms ON sponsorship_agreements.term_id = contract_terms.term_id JOIN obligations ON sponsorship_agreements.obligation_id = obligations.obligation_id;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM sponsor_companies WHERE sponsor_id = 1;
SELECT contact_person FROM sponsor_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM contract_terms WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT company_name, total_payment FROM sponsor_companies JOIN sponsorship_agreements ON sponsor_companies.sponsor_id = sponsorship_agreements.sponsor_id;
SELECT * FROM sponsor_companies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM sponsor_companies WHERE industry IS NOT NULL;

SELECT s.company_name, c.term_description, o.obligation_description, sa.total_payment FROM sponsor_companies s JOIN sponsorship_agreements sa ON s.sponsor_id = sa.sponsor_id JOIN contract_terms c ON sa.term_id = c.term_id JOIN obligations o ON sa.obligation_id = o.obligation_id;
SELECT * FROM contract_terms WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT s.company_name, sa.total_payment FROM sponsor_companies s JOIN sponsorship_agreements sa ON s.sponsor_id = sa.sponsor_id WHERE sa.total_payment > 5000;
